name: Star System
description: In this space-themed Runner-style game, your objective is to dodge the various meteor showers, fight the alien patrols and their leaders, Alien Green, Alien Blue and the great mighty Alien Purple. Collect stars along the way to unlock your Star System companions, each spaceship has a unique ability to help you reach the highest Highscore. Unlock all spaceships and use them to your advantage to reach the highest positions in the online ranking disputed by all players. Good luck astronaut, see you in space!
